title: Mystery gift not working
body: I recieved a mystery gift and it said i got infernal nasus but i cant use it and its telling me i need to purchase the skin. Was wondering of anyone could help me?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Apologies for such a delayed response.

Can you check your gifting history for me and tell me if the skin shows up there.

* Go to the store
* Purchases
* View my Gifting History

If the skin does show up there and you are still unable to use it in-game then you'll need to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support as they're the only ones who can help with Account-Related issues.
